body:
I've been using the app for about a week without issue and it was great until a few days ago. I started getting both "503 service unavailable" screens on the app with the tray at the bottom visible, but I'll also get a "internal server Error" page that is blank saving the text at the top. I've tried reinstalling it a couple times, but no dice. 

I know the app is unofficial, but was wondering if it's just me experiencing the issue or if it's across the board for everyone.
body_html:
I've been using the app for about a week without issue and it was great until a few days ago. I started getting both "503 service unavailable" screens on the app with the tray at the bottom visible, but I'll also get a "internal server Error" page that is blank saving the text at the top. I've tried reinstalling it a couple times, but no dice.

I know the app is unofficial, but was wondering if it's just me experiencing the issue or if it's across the board for everyone.

title: App 503?

body: I've gotten this error as well on android, but reinstalling has fixed the error for me every time. Maybe it's the version? I've got an s8 with software all up to date (because I'm a normie).

body:
I'm running app version 1.1.1 on a Moto g6, also a normie. 

The reinstall has "fixed the problem"... Until it happens again later the same day or the next morning. I'm going to try force quitting and see if that helps.
body_html:
I'm running app version 1.1.1 on a Moto g6, also a normie.

The reinstall has "fixed the problem"... Until it happens again later the same day or the next morning. I'm going to try force quitting and see if that helps.
